name: Smiles In The Champions
description:
The "Demo" Will be downloadable & playable on here: https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/uabqu6mh9ecd5kqz3lfglg/smiles-in-the-cha...

The Non-Demo Version is now downloadable but in development.

Plot:

In a cult that clones children to become slaves at 13 years of age, the age that deems you a capable teenager, a teenage slave named An Fùzhì zi xiàng & her little brother Liang Fùzhì zi xiàng are caught in a scandal that may cost them their lives if caught.

The Duan family had them to be slaves to the cult members.

Once An became Christian & Liang joined, it violated the cult's laws, especially those for slaves.

An's mother, Shi, & their father, Zheng-Zhou, used them as slaves for a while.

The cult was named "The Order of the Bitter Jewel."

You see, slaves here are NEVER meant to see Christianity.

This is due to all the parts in the bible where slaves are set free.

When a cult member who is not a slave nor a clone becomes Christian, they are made into slaves.

Converting others causes them to be killed.

Clones are not given a second chance at life & are treated as less than human.

They are killed, slave is the lowest rank when you are a clone.

If not, A non-cloned slave is ranked above a cloned one. So much so that the clone is supposed to obey the non-cloned slave.
